Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder-section of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, the fabric is cream-coloured in section, the interior is slightly grooved, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents as wine of year 1.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393399) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393399)
